channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 03:34 Alarm lifted in Kyiv region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游릭 03:34 Alarm lifted in Kyiv region. Follow further messages. #Kyiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 00:31 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in the Pokrovsk territorial community. Take shelter!

Take shelter! #쮏쥄쮏쒬혧햨햟_혝햣햦혝쮐햦햟햩혧햫햟_햡쮏쨿썛얧 This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
